taDuoc: Kem không nhờn vừa đủ (stearyl alcohol, cetyl alcohol, glycerol monostearat, polyoxyethylen (20) cetyl ether, sáp ong trắng, liquid parafin, dimethicon 350, hydroxytoluen được butylat hóa, methyl hydroxybenzoat, propyl hydroxybenzoat, propylen glycol, dinatri edetat, acid citric, hydroxy propyl beta cyclodextrin, nước tinh khiết)
